ygData.subject: Re: Mistmoore quest components
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A full group in the mid-high 20s should be able to take out any one of them.  Six of us killed a musician when we were L25-30, and though it was a tough
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Always willing to take a risk, I'm thinking about heading to Mistmoore after
> I get the bracelet in Unrest. Need to get an idea of how tough the deadly
> usher and gypsy musicians are. I hope to join with a higher level group
> (assuming they will accept a 25 bard in the group). Assuming a full group
> of six, what level characters are required to fight against these mobs?

A full group in the mid-high 20s should be able to take out
any one of them. Six of us killed a musician when we were
L25-30, and though it was a tough fight, we were never in any
real danger of losing.

The problem is getting just one.

> Also, the only places I've gone to in Mistmoore are the initial areas beside
> the lake and the graveyard. Nothing I ran into in those locations could see
> through the invisibility song. Are there any mobs deeper in the zone that
> can See Invis? I would assume that the DE casters can buff themselves with
> the spell. Got a bad feeling that all the gargoyles can as well. Still
> willing to take the chance though.

They can't see through invisibility, nor have I ever found one
that could. The only things I've met there that see through
invis are the undead - the scantily clad white-skinned females
with the bad backs (hunched over), and the well dressed
white-skinned males. I think they're supposed to be vampires.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
